attributes.action: Prohibit Commercial Companies From Misleading The Public Into Believing They're A Charity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Time after time leaflets from private companies asking for clothing for the "Third World" or "Victims of Chernobyl" land on our doormats.  In fact, these companies are pocketing the cash generated from these collections and even selling the inferior grade clothing to the poorest people in the poorest countries.

This cynical commercialism is deception by any other name and any responsible government would act quickly to prohibit the activities of these commercial ventures.
